title: ‘Captain Condor’ Wipeout Offers Harsh Lesson in Managing Risk
description: It wasn’t some YOLO trade that took down a successful options trader over Christmas, but a centuries-old gambling strategy popular with amateur blackjack players.
content: It wasn’t some YOLO trade that took down a successful options trader over Christmas, but a centuries-old gambling strategy popular with amateur blackjack players.
